column4: Can anyone advise me on how to install a hardware accelerated graphics driver for intel? My graphics card is (according to lshw): Mobile 945GM/GMS, 943/940GML Express Integrated Graphics Controller
ubuntu comes with all needeed drivers by default
nowhere. you already have all the drives
the hardware accelerated driver is not enabled though
I don't have a program by that name and don't find it in the package manager
or your ubuntu is not properly installed
it finds libgl1-mesa-glx and libglu1-mesa and says ii next to both of them
I believe I should be using "the xorg intel driver", the package is installed but I don't see anything about a driver called "intel" in my xorg.conf
it seems the be using the mesa driver instead of the intel one, but what is the correct way to change the driver?
